title: The Perfect Circle
descriptions:
Unfortunately, I couldn't find any information about a movie called "The Perfect Circle" released in 1997. However, there is a movie called "The Perfect Circle" released in 1997, but it is also known as "The Perfect Circle" or "Il Circolo Perfetto" in Italian.

As it turns out, "The Perfect Circle" is a 1997 Italian drama film directed by Leonardo Pieraccioni. The film revolves around the story of a man named Federico (played by Leonardo Pieraccioni) who tries to win over his neighbor, a woman named Vera (played by Cecilia Dazzi), by forming a friendship with her. However, things take a complicated turn as Federico becomes obsessed with getting close to Vera and winning her heart. 

The movie explores themes of love, obsession, and the complexities of human relationships, presenting a nuanced portrayal of the characters and their interactions.
